label: partyTypeCode
comment: A code specifying the type of TT party.
A code specifying the type of trade party that is independent of its role.
The code specifying the type of requesting party.

rangeIncludes.comment: A character string used to represent the type of a party.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
An individual, group, or body related to a Track and Trace (TT) process.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
